author: jgomes
msg: Refactored locking to minimize the length locks are held.

author: jgomes
msg: Refactored transport factory to not cache sub-transport factories.  Removal of the cache solves race condition when multiple threads are creating multiple connection factories.  It also solves isolation problem where failover transport requires multiple transport factories to support separate transport settings per failover connection.

author: szetszwo
msg: HADOOP-5873. Remove deprecated methods randomDataNode() and getDatanodeByIndex(..) in FSNamesystem.
